message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. This is a great price, considering the value it will bring to your life and business.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. It's a good starting point. However, I'm looking to spend a maximum of $10,000 on this product. Would you be willing to come down to that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $10,800. This is a great compromise that still reflects the value the product will bring to you, while also being more affordable for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit over budget.  Could we meet at $10,500?  This would be a great deal for both of us.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $10,700. This is the lowest price I can offer and still ensure I make a reasonable profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to prioritize my own interests as well.
